name: Warwick
title: the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun
lore: Warwick is a monster who hunts the gray alleys of Zaun. Transformed by agonizing experiments, his body is fused with an intricate system of chambers and pumps, machinery filling his veins with alchemical rage. Bursting out of the shadows, he preys upon those criminals who terrorize the city's depths. Warwick is drawn to blood, and driven mad by its scent. None who spill it can escape him.
blurb: Warwick is a monster who hunts the gray alleys of Zaun. Transformed by agonizing experiments, his body is fused with an intricate system of chambers and pumps, machinery filling his veins with alchemical rage. Bursting out of the shadows, he preys upon...
allytips: Follow your Blood Hunt trails to low health enemy champions.
Infinite Duress (R)'s distance scales with any movement speed you gain, even from ally buffs and summoner spells.
Jaws of the Beast (Q) will follow enemies who run, dash or teleport if you keep the button held down.
enemytips: Warwick's attacks heal him at low health. Save your disables to finish him off.
Warwick is empowered versus low health enemies. Manage your health to keep him at bay.
Warwick's ultimate cast range scales with his movement speed.

riot_spells.name: Jaws of the Beast
riot_spells.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Warwick lunges forward and bites his target. While the key is held down, he will attach to the target then leap behind them.

On release, deals {{ a1 }}+{{ a2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of your target's maximum health as magic damage (applies On Hit effects). Heal {{ e3 }}% of damage dealt.

While attached, Warwick follows any movements they make and cannot be displaced.

riot_spells.name: Blood Hunt
riot_spells.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: Warwick gains {{ e2 }}% attack speed against enemies below 50% health. He also senses low health champions globally, moving {{ e1 }}% faster toward them when out of combat. These bonuses are tripled against enemies below 20% health.

Active: Warwick briefly senses all enemies. The nearest sensed champion is Blood Hunted for 8 seconds. Cast only while not in combat with a champion.

While no enemies are being hunted, Blood Hunt cools down twice as fast.

riot_spells.name: Primal Howl
riot_spells.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
riot_spells.tooltip: Warwick gains {{ e1 }}% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end of the duration, or if activated again, Warwick howls, causing all nearby enemies to flee for {{ e3 }} second.

riot_spells.name: Infinite Duress
riot_spells.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
riot_spells.tooltip: Warwick leaps 2.5 seconds worth of movement speed in a direction, suppressing the first champion he collides with for {{ rduration }} seconds. Deals <magicDamage>{{ damagecumulative }}</magicDamage> magic damage and applies on-hit effects 3 times. Warwick heals for 100% of all damage he deals during Infinite Duress.

riot_passive.name: Eternal Hunger
riot_passive.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

i1.name: Eternal Hunger
i1.blurb: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Warwick's''' basic attacks deal {{pp|10 to 44}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} [[on-hit]].
i1.description2: While {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}} he is also {{tip|heal|healed}} by the amount of post-mitigation damage ''Eternal Hunger'' deals. This healing is increased{{ft|by 150%|to {{pp|10*2.5 to 44*2.5}}}}while {{as|{{sti|health|below 25% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the '''bonus''' damage cannot).
* ''Eternal Hunger'' does not affect structures.

q1.name: Jaws of the Beast
q1.blurb: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dashes}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to the target enemy and bites them, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, applying [[on-hit effects]] and {{sti|healing}} himself for a portion of the damage dealt.
q1.leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{as|120% AD}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 8}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Healing Percentage|{{ap|30 to 90}}%}}
q1.description2: If ''Jaws of the Beast'' is held, '''Warwick''' will lock his teeth into his target and use them to swing himself around to their far side. '''Warwick''' is {{tip|pacify|unable to act}} while swinging around his target, and will move wherever they move until he jumps off. '''Warwick''' cannot be {{tip|airborne|displaced}} while attached to an enemy.
q1.notes:
* The ability will not cancel if the target dies during its cast time.
* '''Warwick''' cannot be {{tip|airborne|displaced}} while attached to an enemy, but can be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} prior to reaching them.
* The button must be held until Warwick reaches his target to trigger the second effect.
* While ''Jaws of the Beast'' does not use Quick Casting by default, click-and-hold is comparable to the input required to use {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} or {{ai|Decimating Smash|Sion}} while using Quick Casting. It does not accept two-click input (e.g. First Cast and Second Cast) that Standard Casters will be used to on the aforementioned abilities.

w1.name: Blood Hunt
w1.blurb: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Warwick''' senses all enemy {{tip|champions}} below {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}, marking them as ''Blood Hunted'' as well as highlighting their position to his team. '''Warwick''' additionally sees a "blood trail" highlighting the shortest path to the ''Blood Hunted'' target, and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while following it.
w1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|35 to 55}}%|Enhanced Movement Speed|{{ap|35*2.5 to 55*2.5}}%}}
w1.description2: '''Warwick''' also gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} upon attacking a ''Blood Hunted'' target or an enemy unit {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
w1.leveling2: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|50 to 110}}%|Enhanced Attack Speed|{{ap|50*2.5 to 110*2.5}}%}}
w1.description3: The '''bonus''' movement and attack speed is increased against enemies {{as|{{sti|health|below 20% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
w1.description4: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' briefly senses all enemies and then ''Blood Hunts'' the nearest enemy champion within a large radius for 8 seconds, regardless of their {{as|{{sti|health|'''current''' health}}}}.
w1.description5: After being in combat with a champion ''Blood Hunt'' may only be activated passively for 3 seconds. Its bonus movement speed will also be lost for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, but will build up again every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
w1.cooldown: {{tt|{{ap|120 to 60}}|Cools down twice as fast while not Blood Hunting}}
w1.notes:
* Enemies who are ''Blood Hunted'' will display a red wolf mark on their heads while ominous music will replace their Summoner's Rift default chosen song until they are no longer ''Blood Hunted'', with a small delay.
* ''Blood Hunt'' can detect and target [[Champion_summoned_units#decoys|decoys]].
* The blood trail, altough described as a trail, does '''not''' indicate where the target has been - only the quickest route to their current location, and it will update as you and/or the target move.
* '''Warwick''' will lose his movement speed bonus if enemies that are not ''Blood Hunted'' stay exactly between him and the ''Blood Hunted'' target.
* ''Blood Hunt's'' passive only senses enemies that go below the {{as|health}} threshold while '''Warwick''' is alive. A unit that went below 50% health while '''Warwick''' was dead and has not taken damage while he is alive will not be detected by ''Blood Hunt'' until it falls low again.
** Same applies to enemy champions that went under the threshold by taking [[Nexus Obelisk]] damage or to units that spawn with their current health below the threshold (i.e {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}).
* The detection from ''Blood Hunt'' is more similar to {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Tremor Sense}} than a form of sight - it grants positional information only. It does not explicitly inform '''Warwick''' about who is low health or if they are alone.

e1.name: Primal Howl
e1.blurb: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
e1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Warwick''' reduces all incoming damage for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. After 1 second, ''Primal Howl'' can be re-activated, and automatically does so after {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Warwick''' unleashes a howl, ending the damage reduction in the process, and causes all nearby enemies to {{tip|flee}} for 1 second as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90%.
e1.description3: Landing {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} will instantly reactivate ''Primal Howl'' without prematurely ending the damage reduction buff.
e1.notes:
* The second activation will cancel '''Warwick's''' basic attack.
** '''Warwick''' cannot attack during the animation.

r1.name: Infinite Duress
r1.blurb: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} in the target direction, {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} the first champion he collides with for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
r1.description2: '''Warwick''' {{tip|channels}} while the target is {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} by hitting the target up to 6 times while also applying [[on-hit effects]] up to 3 times. ''Infinite Duress'' {{sti|heals}} '''Warwick''' for all the damage dealt.
r1.target_range: {{tt|{{as|250% '''current''' Movement Speed}}|The range can change mid-air, potentially stopping the dash}}
r1.notes:
* The dash will be interrupted instantly if an enemy flashes in front of '''Warwick'''.
* The minimum range of the ability is 275 units, based on the minimum movement speed that a champion can have (110) while still being able to move. The "base" range of this ability is {{fd|837.5}} because of his 335 base movement speed.
** Considering movement speed soft caps, with {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}}, this range increases to {{ap|(335*1.35*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.4*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.45*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.5*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*1.55*0.5+230)*2.5}}, further increased to {{ap|(335*(1+0.35*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.4*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.45*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.5*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.55*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5}} against enemy champions {{as|below 20% health}}.
* The 6 hits are done in cycles of 2 hits every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The first hit deals 2/9 of the total damage and triggers the on-hit effects once while the second hit deals 1/9 of it.
* The healing is increased by {{sti|life steal}}.
